author: Gearoid Reidy
title: Tokyo Braces for Critical Weekend in Fight to Contain Outbreak
description: With Prime Minister Shinzo Abe teetering on the brink of declaring a state of emergency over the coronavirus, Tokyo is bracing for a critical weekend that could determine whether Japan can continue to sidestep the surge in outbreaks that have crippled other r…
content:
Pedestrians cross a road in the Shinjuku district of Tokyo, Japan, on March 26.
With Prime Minister Shinzo Abe teetering on the brink of declaring a state of emergency over the coronavirus, Tokyo is bracing for a
